trans-unit.source:
Set the view you want to display
  • Album list displays a list of albums. Clicking on an album leads to the display of the photos of this album, the single album photos.
  • Single album photos displays the photos within a single album. You will have to choose which album to use.
Choose the album to use for displaying it's photos. You will have to have set the Record Storage Page where the album is stored and saved first

Whether to use facebook redirect urls for the photos or not.

Facebook is using a global CDN (Content Delivery Network). This means that a user in Europe will retrieve an image using a different address than a use in Australia. Each user is presented with an address that is nearer, to his/her location. and thus faster to access.

When the checkbox is unchecked, the plugin uses as image web addresses a direct link to the image file, as it would be used when you reside at your server's location. The advantage is that in this way you can get large versions for your images. The disadvantage is that your users may be located in a totally different location of the world than your server, and thus would access the image less efficiently. Moreover, the addresses Facebook uses tend to change and if you do not synchronize frequently, the image files may not be found.

When the checkbox is checked, the images are served using a facebook redirect url. Facebook redirects to the the address that is nearer to your users location. The disadvantage is that these urls do not support large versions of the images. The quality of the images will be low. This may not be a problem for you if you do not need large images.

How the list of albums should be displayed
  • Plain: Plain list of album cover photos with title and descriptions. Clicking on the leads to the photos list of the album.
  • Css Masonry: A little bit more fancy display of the list of albums.
  • Raw: A raw output of the album list. Should not be used in production.

How the list of albums should be displayed
  • Plain: Plain list of photos with description. Clicking on an image opens the photo in a new window.
  • Css Masonry with lightbox: More fancy display of the photo list with an integrated lightbox to view larger images.
  • Unite Gallery: Uses the great Unite Gallery to show the images. You can choose the theme to use. You must include JQuery in your page for this to work!
  • Raw: A raw output of the photo list. Should not be used in production.
The theme of the Unite Gallery. Demos about the theme are available at http://unitegallery.net/
Should the gallery automatically start to play?
The pause between transitions if autoplay is enabled. In milliseconds
The gallery width. Number in pixels (e.g. 900) or percentage (e.g. 90%). Depends on the theme
The minimum width of the gallery
The minimum height of the gallery

Additional parameters for the gallery. All parameters per theme are available at http://unitegallery.net/. Example 
carousel_space_between_tiles: 20
carousel_scroll_duration:500
